title: Microwave apple kugel
ingredients: ['225g noodles or pasta', '3 eggs', '75g caster sugar', '2 apples, peeled, cored and finely chopped', '120g soured cream', '100g cottage cheese', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '60g raisins', '2 tablespoons light brown soft sugar', '2 tablespoons chopped walnuts', '2 tablespoons butter']
